short_summary: Purchase of subscription agent services for the acquisition of publications subscriptions and delivery of subscriptions and support to the electronic resource management platform
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: ... See notice URL at the end for full documentation
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Title
W8160-235020: Subscription Agent Services

### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the  Department of National Defence (DND) invites tenders for the supply of Subscription Agent Services. The Canadian Armed Forces Virtual Library requires a firm to act on their behalf for the acquisition, delivery, management, and related support of subscriptions to publications of all types and in all media, including electronic content hosted remotely by a publisher.

### Tender Details
- **Reference Number**: WS4472782958
- **Publication Date**: 13 March 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: 28 March 2024 at 14:00 EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 22 March 2024

### Notice
Please disregard the updated closing time posted on the Ariba Discovery website and any other CanadaBuys posting. All bids must be submitted by 28 March 2024 at 14:00 EST to be considered.

### Initial Notice
Supply Arrangement E60PI-23AGNT B is incorporated by reference and forms part of this solicitation. Interested parties, including the following incumbent SA holder, must submit a proposal to be considered:
  * EBSCO Canada LTD

### Procurement Category
The procurement method falls under the Competitive, Selective Tendering category. Selection criteria may include variations or combinations of the above methods.

### Trade Agreement
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions
The contract will be delivered in Canada.

### Contact
For inquiries, please contact: Matthew Curran, Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)

    Email: [matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Documents
Further details can be found on the Ariba Discovery website, with reference number:
  * https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19081168?extsite=MTkwODExNjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note:
There is no amendment to the expected contract start date or the expected contract end date, so those fields have been left out in the final version. Additionally, for the sake of brevity, I have removed some redundant text and sections that contained no critical information. URLs and email addresses were verified to be in English
